name: Anti-Money Laundering Investigation
description: Comprehensive AML investigation workflow that analyzes transaction patterns, performs entity resolution, and generates detailed investigation reports for compliance teams.

steps.name: AML Alert Intake
steps.description: Collect and validate AML alerts from transaction monitoring systems; attach runId and timestamp.

steps.name: Entity Resolution
steps.description: Resolve customer entities and identify related parties across KYC, CRM, and external data.

steps.name: Transaction Pattern Analysis
steps.description: Detect structuring, smurfing, and velocity anomalies; emit scored indicators.

steps.name: Risk Scoring
steps.description: Aggregate indicator scores with profile risk; compute composite SAR likelihood.

steps.name: Investigation Planning
steps.description: Draft action plan, assign tasks, and set SLAs with decision gates.

steps.name: SAR Report Compilation
steps.description: Assemble narrative, evidence set, and filing metadata; persist and return JSON.
